name: Star Sign
description:
Star Sign is a fast 3D platformer. Extend your arms to swing around and slingshot yourself across huge levels. Discover a broken world and find your way back to the skies! Explore different areas and overcome unique challenges

Features:
  • Large open levels
  • Grab onto any surface to swing around
  • Stretch your arms to slingshot yourself over great distances
  • A "The Floor is Lava" and "No Checkpoints" mode for extra challenge
